attributes.name: initial-index
attributes.desc: the initial preview image index, less than or equal to the length of url-list.

attributes.name: hide-on-click-modal
attributes.desc: whether user can emit close event when clicking backdrop.

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether to append image itself to body. A nested parent element attribute transform should have this attribute set to true.

attributes.name: zoom-rate ^(2.2.27)
attributes.desc: the zoom rate of the image viewer zoom event.

attributes.name: min-scale ^(2.4.0)
attributes.desc: the min scale of the image viewer zoom event.

attributes.name: max-scale ^(2.4.0)
attributes.desc: the max scale of the image viewer zoom event.

attributes.name: close-on-press-escape
attributes.desc: whether the image-viewer can be closed by pressing ESC.

attributes.name: show-progress ^(2.9.4)
attributes.desc: whether to display the preview image progress content

events.name: @close
events.desc: trigger when clicking on close button or when `hide-on-click-modal` enabled clicking on backdrop.
